title: pip55
author: pip55
content: Hi, trying to mint an NFT which is only available to people from US. I can access with VPN, but it also needs a phone number for sms verification. I have tried many online services without success (either says invalid number or sms won't arrive), hence offering someone with US phone number 5$ to receive it.I tell you which nft in advance in case you want to mint it for yourself.To prevent scam from either side:1. you tell me the phone number and i use it to register my account2. you confirm receival of the sms (without telling the code yet)3. i pay 5$ in a shitcoin of your choice, then you send me the codePM if interestedpip

comments.author: aliveNFT
comments.body: Newbies can't DM you, change your privacy settings.Tell me what kind of service is this? Also open your private messages, I'll give you a number.

comments.author: pip55
comments.body: already allowed.. when i try to send you a PM i get the same error.let's use email: pip542@protonmail.com

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: If you haven't solved check also this service/website:silent.link
